author: cmpilato
msg: Teach the repos commit editor to work on a provided Subversion
transaction.  A special gift for Chia-liang Kao.
(struct edit_baton): Add 'txn_owner' member, and re-org a little bit.
(open_root): If we aren't the owner of our commit transaction, we'll
make a new one.  Otherwise, we open the one provided us and set
(abort_edit): Only abort the txn if it has been created/opened and

author: fitz
msg: Give the same hook_create_request setup treatment from r13731 to
svn_ra_dav__unlock to avoid multiple adds of the unlock callback.
Remove local lrb and use the one in the dav session baton.  Clear
and reload the baton's lrb for each lock request.  Remove TODO.
